comment:
* A Face contains all the information identifying the location
     * of a face in a bitmap.

variables.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
variables.comment: The minimum confidence factor of good face recognition

variables.name: EULER_X
variables.comment: The x-axis Euler angle of a face.

variables.name: EULER_Y
variables.comment: The y-axis Euler angle of a face.

variables.name: EULER_Z
variables.comment: The z-axis Euler angle of a face.

methods.name: public float confidence()
methods.comment:
* Returns a confidence factor between 0 and 1. This indicates how
         * certain what has been found is actually a face. A confidence
         * factor above 0.3 is usually good enough.

methods.name: public void getMidPoint(PointF point)
methods.comment:
* Sets the position of the mid-point between the eyes.
         * @param point the PointF coordinates (float values) of the 
         *              face's mid-point

methods.name: public float eyesDistance()
methods.comment: * Returns the distance between the eyes.

methods.name: public float pose(int euler)
methods.comment:
* Returns the face's pose. That is, the rotations around either 
         * the X, Y or Z axis (the positions in 3-dimensional Euclidean space).
         * 
         * @param euler the Euler axis to retrieve an angle from 
         *              (<var>EULER_X</var>, <var>EULER_Y</var> or 
         *              <var>EULER_Z</var>)
         * @return the Euler angle of the of the face, for the given axis
